description: The nine energy centers in the Human Design bodygraph

knowledge.theme: Inspiration and mental pressure to know
knowledge.question: How do we make sense of life?
knowledge.whenUndefined: Variable mental pressure, open to inspiration
knowledge.description: The Head Center is a pressure center that generates mental pressure to think, question, and seek answers. It creates the drive to understand and make sense of existence through concepts and questions.

knowledge.theme: Processing and making sense of information
knowledge.question: What am I certain about?
knowledge.whenDefined: Fixed way of thinking and processing
knowledge.whenUndefined: Flexible thinking, open to multiple perspectives
knowledge.description: The Ajna Center processes mental data and creates concepts, patterns, and perspectives. It is the center of conceptualization where we form opinions, beliefs, and mental certainty.

knowledge.question: What do I need to communicate or do?
knowledge.whenDefined: Consistent way of expressing and manifesting
knowledge.whenUndefined: Variable expression, receptive to others' voices
knowledge.description: The Throat Center is the center of communication, manifestation, and metamorphosis. It brings the inner world to the outer world through voice, action, and expression. All manifestation in Human Design flows through the Throat.

knowledge.question: Who am I and where am I going?
knowledge.whenDefined: Consistent sense of identity and direction
knowledge.description: The G Center is the magnetic monopole, the center of identity, direction, and love. It holds our sense of self and provides direction in life. It is the driver of the vehicle, determining our path and purpose.

knowledge.question: What is my worth?
knowledge.whenDefined: Consistent willpower and sense of self-worth
knowledge.description: The Heart (Ego/Will) Center is about willpower, promises, and material world manifestation. It is the center of the ego and the small self, dealing with self-worth, value, and the ability to make and keep commitments.

knowledge.theme: Work, sexuality, and life force energy
knowledge.question: What work is sustainable for me?
knowledge.whenUndefined: No consistent access to life force (Projector/Manifestor/Reflector)
knowledge.description: The Sacral Center is the most powerful motor, providing life force and sexual energy. It is the generator of life itself, creating sustainable energy for work and reproduction. Only Generators and Manifesting Generators have this center defined.

knowledge.question: What is my emotional truth?
knowledge.whenDefined: Consistent emotional wave (needs clarity over time)
knowledge.description: The Solar Plexus is the center of emotions, creating waves of feeling over time. It is evolving to become the spirit awareness center. When defined, emotional clarity requires riding the wave and waiting for clarity over time.

knowledge.question: Am I safe right now?
knowledge.whenUndefined: Open to fears and health concerns of others
knowledge.description: The Spleen is the oldest awareness center, providing survival instincts and immune function. It speaks once in the now with spontaneous intuition about safety, health, and wellbeing. Its voice is quiet and does not repeat.

knowledge.theme: Pressure to act and get things done
knowledge.question: When will I be free of this pressure?
knowledge.whenDefined: Consistent adrenal pressure to complete things
knowledge.description: The Root Center generates pressure to act, evolve, and complete cycles. It is both a motor (providing fuel for action) and a pressure center (creating stress to move and accomplish). It drives us to finish what we start and evolve.
